author: Yanzhong Huang
title: China's approach to containing coronavirus cannot be replicated
description: China has gotten a grip on its coronavirus outbreak by deploying authoritarian methods of containment.
content:
What a spatial and temporal shift. Just one month ago, we were preoccupied with the ballooning number of COVID-19 cases and the rising death toll in China.
Mainstream media outlets in the West, which had at first criticised China's cover-up and inaction duri… [+6772 chars]
